name: Pong (itch) (littleagames)
description:
I wanted to take some time to make smaller games to teach myself certain elements of Unity, and to help enforce a "start-to-completion" process for games. No one wants to fall into a habit of only getting partially through a game, and lose interest. Making small games like this help see the entire process through.

There is nothing unique about this pong game. It is just traditional pong. It is playable. There is no AI for the 2nd player, W and S control player 1, and the Up/Down keys control player 2.
